testcase.classname: Test Login functionality for invalid credentials
testcase.name: User cannot login with invalid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User should launch application........................................passed And User click on Account button............................................passed And User click on Login button..............................................passed When User enter invalid email and password..................................passed Then User should not able to login into account.............................passed

testcase.classname: Test send a gift card price on gift card page
testcase.name: User should able to check amount
testcase.system-out: Given User should launch application........................................passed And User click on Menu......................................................passed And User click on Gift Cards................................................passed And User reach on Gift cards page...........................................passed And User click on Send an E-Gift Card button................................passed When User enter all Value , Qauntity,Message, Recipient Name,Email on page..passed And User click on Add to Cart button........................................passed Then User should able to see total amount of gift card......................passed

testcase.system-out: Given User should launch application........................................passed When User should check http status code for Cineplex Digital Media..........passed Then http status code validation it should not be broken link...............passed

testcase.classname: Test Food and Drink page for order food to validate combo name,price,items,calories,serves
testcase.name: User should be able to see Combo Name,Price,Items,Calories and Serves
testcase.system-out: Given User should launch application........................................passed And User click on Menu......................................................passed And User click on food & drink button.......................................passed And User reach to food & drink page.........................................passed And User click on order now button..........................................passed And User reach on order now page............................................passed When User select mobile pick up location from dropdown......................passed And User click on view menu.................................................passed And User reach on food menu page............................................passed And User click on combo three...............................................passed Then User should be able see Combo Name, Price,Items, Calories and Serves...passed
